info.description: This API allows for querying data from the Homeownership Platform, inserting new records and updating data as changes occur.
info.title: Inside Real Estate Homeownership Platform API

license.name: Inside Real Estate Homeownership Platform API License

tags.name: property
tags.description: Operations that all you to retrieve or update one or more real estate property records

tags.name: risk
tags.description: Operations that return property risk information

tags.name: market
tags.description: Operations that return real estate market statistics for an address or area

tags.name: mortgage
tags.description: Operations that allow you to retrieve or update a mortgage record for a property

tags.name: insurance
tags.description: Operations that allow you to retrieve or update insurance information for a property

tags.name: recommendation
tags.description: Operations that return one or more recommendations

tags.name: media
tags.description: Operations that allow you to retrieve or update media records

tags.name: homeowner
tags.description: Operations that allow you to retrieve or update homeowner information

get.description: Get a detailed property information about a homeownerId. Optionally enter a propertyId to restrict results to single property for the homeowner.

200.description: A list of properties with details.

get.description: Get detailed property information for a specific property that matches the address input.
Get a detailed set of market statistics related to real estate listings and sales. Optionally enter a propertyId to restrict results to single property for the homeowner.

200.description: A detailed set of market statistics for areas to which the given homeowner is subscribed.

get.description: Get a detailed set of market statistics related to real estate listings and sales.

200.description: A detailed set of market statistics related to a given area

get.description: Get a detailed homeowner record using its unique homeownerId as input.
Get a detailed homeowner record using its kvCORE contact ID and agent website domain as input.
Get a detailed home valuation records using homeownerId as input. Optionally enter a propertyId to restrict results to single property for the homeowner.
Get a detailed home valuation record using its address as input.
Get a detailed tax records for a homeowner. Optionally enter a propertyId to restrict results to single property for the homeowner.
Get a detailed home tax record using its address as input.
Get a detailed set of risk data related to the area with a homeownerId as input.

200.description: A detailed set of risk data related to a given area

get.description: Get a detailed set of risk data related to the area with an address as input.

200.description: A detailed set of risk data related to a given area

get.description: Get a detailed set of mortgage data with a homeownerId as input.

200.description: A detailed set of mortgage data related to a given homeowner and property

get.description: Get a detailed set of mortgage data with a address as input.

200.description: A detailed set of mortgage data related to a given homeowner and property

post.description: Add a loan to a property.

patch.description: Update an existing loan on a property with the loanId.

delete.description: Delete an existing loan on a property with the loanId.

get.description: Get a detailed set of insurance data with a homeownerId as input.

200.description: A detailed set of insurance data related to a given homeowner and property

get.description: Get a detailed set of insurance data with an address as input.

200.description: A detailed set of insurance data related to a given homeowner and property

post.description: Add an insurance policy to a property.

patch.description: Update an existing insurance policy on a property with a policy Id.

delete.description: Delete an existing insurance policy with the policy Id.

post.description: Create media record and return signed S3 url for upload

BadRequest.description: There was an invalid parameter in the request.

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found.

UnexpectedError.description: Something unexpected occured in the processing of the request.

InsurancePolicy.description: Details about an insurance policy on a property.

corporateIndicator.description: This indicates if the owner is a corporation.

lastName.description: The last name of the homeowner.

firstName.description: The first name of the homeowner.

fullAddress.description: Address of the property all in one line.

country.description: Country where the property is located.

filename.description: The file name of the file to be uploaded.

fileType.description: Enumeration of file types that can be uploaded

mediaType.description: Enumeration of the media type of the file to be uploaded.

relatedObjectId.description: The unique identifier of the object this picture is being uploaded for (i.e. - homeownerId, propertyId, etc.).

relatedObjectType.description: The object type the relatedObjectId represents (i.e. - homeonwer, property, etc.).

secure.description: Document is only accessible to the homeowner.

isPrimary.description: Indicate primary media object to be used as a cover photo or thumbnail where applicable.

brokerName.example: Julia B Fee Sothebys Int. Realty

listingRemarks.example: Beautiful lake front property with many features...

loanAmount.description: Original principal amount on the loan.

loanBalance.description: Estimated outstanding balance on the loan.

deedType.description: The type of deed on the property.

loanRefinance.description: Indicates if the loan is a refinance type.

loanEquity.description: Indicates if the loan is a home equity type.

policyType.description: the specific type of policy the homeowner currently has

policyStartDate.description: The start date of the homeowner policy.

policyExpirationDate.description: The expiration date of the homeowner policy.

policyPremium.description: The annual premium of the homeowner policy.

policyDeductible.description: The homeowner paid deductible amount of the homeowner policy.

propertyCoverage.description: The total property coverage of the homeowner policy.

liabilityCoverage.description: The total liability coverage of the homeowner policy.

carrierName.description: The name of the policy carrier.

addOnPremium.description: The annual premium of the add-on policy.

addOnDeductible.description: The homeowner paid deductible amount of the add-on policy.

addOnCoverage.description: The total property coverage of the add-on policy.

contactId.description: Unique identifier for the homeowner as a kvCORE contact.

loanId.description: Unique identifier for the specific loan.

addressLine1.name: addressLine1
addressLine1.description: First line of the property address

locality.name: locality
locality.description: Locality, city or town of the property

domain.name: domain
domain.description: website domain of the hosting agent and brokerage

countrySubd.name: countrySubd
countrySubd.description: Two letter state or province abbreviation of the property

areaType.name: areaType
areaType.description: The type of area you wish to use for your search

areaId.name: areaId
areaId.description: The identifier or name of the area to search

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: contact ID of the homeowner in kvCORE
